extendedInfo.description: Listen Shani Dev Mahamantra daily and make your life full of happiness, peaceful.. cool and calm. This app have complete collections of all shani dev maharaj mantra and chalisha with shani mahamantra.BEST FEATURES:1. Listen complete collection of "SHANI MAHAMANTRA COLLECTIONS"   with dialogue in easy language.2. You can play  some other audio stream which help shani dev happy.3. You can create your favorite list.4. You can download audio stream and play locally for high quality.5. You can set particular audio stream or downloaded audio as alarm to play particular time ..    for example every morning every evening ....etc.6. You can play sankh and bell to pray.7. You can provide your suggestion to us.8. You can share your friends and family.Note:  Best on Wifi,  3G and for 2G user can download audio stream locally and play with high quality. For any issue please provide your valuable suggestion. Please  rate us with 5 star for motivation to create free apps*******************************************************************************************************                                      FIX ALL ISSUES*******************************************************************************************************There are many gods in our Hindu religion but lord Shani dev is different from them. He has immense power, appeased toward off, evil eye etc. Saturday is the day which is devoted to Lord Shani Dev. Traditionally God Shani Dev is depicted in Hindu mythology as extremely dark wearing black clothes and mounted on a vulture. The basic mantra of Shani dev is âOm Sham Shanaiscaryaye Namah.âLord Shani Dev who is the son of Surya Dev (Sun) and Chhaya (Suvarna) is also known as one of the nine âNavagrahaâ by Hindu belief. Lord Shani Dev have a seventh place among these nine planets which govern our lives. Another name of Shani dev is Shanaiscarya, Asita, Saptarchi, Kruralochana, Pangu, etc. The birth place of Lord Shani Dev is Saurashtra, Gujarat. Hindu people believe that he is the god causing miseries in the life of a human being. So, Lord Shani Dev occupies the principal position among the Hinduâs God.!!  Jai Shree Shani Dev   !!    !!    Jai Shree Shani Dev  !!       !!  Jai Shree Shani Dev   !!    !!  Jai Shree Shani Dev  !!
